docket_entries.description: COMPLAINT against Northeast Adjusters, Inc, filing fee $ 400, receipt number 0207-7422290 Was the Disclosure Statement on Civil Cover Sheet completed -YES,, filed by Samuel Weber. (Attachments: # 1 Proposed Summons, # 2 Civil Cover Sheet) (Fishbein, Adam) (Entered: 12/29/2014)
Case Assigned to Judge William F. Kuntz, II and Magistrate Judge Viktor V. Pohorelsky. (Davis, Kimberly) (Entered: 12/30/2014)

In accordance with Rule 73 of the Federal Rules of Civil Procedure and Local Rule 73.1, the parties are notified that if all parties consent a United States magistrate judge of this court is available to conduct all proceedings in this civil action including a (jury or nonjury) trial and to order the entry of a final judgment. Attached to the Notice is a blank copy of the consent form that should be filled out, signed and filed electronically only if all parties wish to consent. The form may also be accessed at the following link:http://www.uscourts.gov/uscourts/FormsAndFees/Forms/AO085.pdf. You may withhold your consent without adverse substantive consequences. Do NOT return or file the consent unless all parties have signed the consent. (Davis, Kimberly) (Entered: 12/30/2014)
This attorney case opening filing has been checked for quality control. See the attachment for corrections that were made, if any. (Davis, Kimberly) (Entered: 12/30/2014)
Summons Issued as to Northeast Adjusters, Inc,. (Davis, Kimberly) (Entered: 12/30/2014)
MOTION for Leave to Appear Pro Hac Vice Filing fee $ 150, receipt number 0207-7492195. by Northeast Adjusters, Inc,. (Cromie, John) (Entered: 01/30/2015)
ORDER granting 5 motion for John J. Cromie to appear Pro Hac Vice. Ordered by Magistrate Judge Viktor V. Pohorelsky on 2/2/2015. (Toritto, Jim) (Entered: 02/02/2015)
ANSWER to Complaint by All Defendants. (Cromie, John) (Entered: 03/06/2015)

SCHEDULING ORDER: An initial conference will be held in this case on May 21, 2015 at 11:00 a.m. before Viktor V. Pohorelsky, United States Magistrate Judge in Courtroom 13A of the United States Courthouse, 225 Cadman Plaza East, Brooklyn, New York. All parties are directed to make the disclosures required by Rules 26(a)(1) of the Federal Rules of Civil Procedure no later than five days before the conference. All counsel are required to attend, and plaintiff's counsel is directed to ensure that all counsel are aware of their obligation to appear. Any requests for adjournment must be made in writing on notice to opposing parties, and must disclose whether or not all parties consent. No request for adjournment will be considered unless made at least forty-eight (48) hours before the scheduled conference. Ordered by Magistrate Judge Viktor V. Pohorelsky on 4/16/2015. (Newton, Joan) (Entered: 04/16/2015)
Joint Motion to Appear by Telephone by Samuel Weber. (Fishbein, Adam) (Entered: 05/17/2015)

ORDER granting 7 Motion to Appear by Telephone. Counsel are to call Chambers at 11:30 a.m. on 5/21/15. Ordered by Magistrate Judge Viktor V. Pohorelsky on 5/19/2015. (Time of Conference Corrected to 11:30 a.m. not 10:30 a.m.) Modified on 5/19/2015 (Newton, Joan). (Entered: 05/19/2015)

MINUTE ENTRY for Initial Scheduling Conference held on 5/21/15 before Magistrate Judge Viktor V. Pohorelsky: Scheduling order entered setting deadlines for discovery and other pretrial proceedings. A status conference will be held by telephone on September 2, 2015 at 5:00 p.m., to be initiated by counsel for the plaintiff (Chambers: 718-613-2400). (Newton, Joan) (Entered: 05/22/2015)
MOTION for pre motion conference by Northeast Adjusters, Inc,. (Cromie, John) (Entered: 08/28/2015)

ORDER granting 9 Motion for Pre Motion Conference. The parties shall appear for a Pre Motion Conference on 9/30/2015 at 12:30 PM in Courtroom 6H North before the Honorable William F. Kuntz, II. So Ordered by Judge William F. Kuntz, II on 8/31/2015. (Shah, Kanika) (Entered: 08/31/2015)

MINUTE ENTRY for Telephone Status Conference held on 9/2/15 before Magistrate Judge Viktor V. Pohorelsky: The parties advise that they are satisfied with the discovery they have obtained thus far. The plaintiff may seek some further items of discovery; the defendant does not intend to do so at this point. The defendant has obtained a premotion conference regarding a possible summary judgment motion. The plaintiff does not intend to seek class certification. The next conference will be held in person on January 6, 2016 at 12:00 noon. Counsel are advised to consult the docket to determine where and before whom the conference will be held. (Newton, Joan) (Entered: 09/03/2015)
Consent MOTION to Adjourn Conference by Samuel Weber. (Attachments: # 1 Transcript) (Fishbein, Adam) (Entered: 09/18/2015)

ORDER granting 11 Motion to Adjourn Conference. The Pre Motion Conference previously scheduled for September 30, 2015 is hereby adjourned to October 14, 2015 at 1:30 P.M. in Courtroom 6H North before the Honorable William F. Kuntz, II. So Ordered by Judge William F. Kuntz, II on 9/21/2015. (Shah, Kanika) (Entered: 09/21/2015)
STIPULATION of Dismissal by Samuel Weber (Fishbein, Adam) (Entered: 10/12/2015)
Set/Reset Hearings: The Status Conference set for 10/14/2015 at 1:30 PM is hereby cancelled. (Shah, Kanika) (Entered: 10/13/2015)
STIPULATION AND ORDER OF DISCONTINUANCE: This action is discontinued, with prejudice, and without costs. Ordered by Judge William F. Kuntz, II. (Brucella, Michelle) (Entered: 10/14/2015)
In light of the STIPULATION AND ORDER OF DISCONTINUANCE 13 the Status Conference set for 1/6/2016 before Magistrate Judge Peggy Kuo, is cancelled. (Riquelme, Claudia) (Entered: 01/04/2016)
